section.p:
stygian library .. spiders dead man portal map
Boklob.. HP 50 Attacks.. Web DC 15, immobalize, requires a Str DC 13 to break out of. Bite: d10 + poison 1 per round. Defence: DC 13
Librarian.. insubstantial just a cowel. will move silently towards someone.. not running. drains life (magic dice) when they touch you you roll a magic dice. When you're out of dice you're dead?
